title: BSIS O.C. Pepper Spray/Handcuffing
desc: C.A.S. & Sons Protective Group offers a Basic Handcuffing Course combined with O.C. Pepper Spray Certification. Students will learn how to properly use handcuffs in order to effect an arrest. ?Also, each studeent will learn how to search suspects for weapons.  The vast majority of Security Officers in ?the State of California are working in an unarmed capacity. ?As a result, this course will help officers defend against violent situations by employing O.C. Pepper Spray. All courses are taught by certified instructors. ?Space is limited, so please pre-register to guarantee a seat. Students have the option to pay on-line or at the door. ? For further information, email casandsonsgroup@gmail.com. See you at training!
